Your collections, lookbook and order form in one app

Show off your own collection, order new styles and stock from your very own iPad or iPhone app. Easy to use, simple to learn. Sell more, sell better and sell faster. Colect by Apps4Fashion is the leading sales and order-entry app in use in the fashion industry today.

...and why you will love them

Online and offline order entry

Connect to all your information in your backoffice system even without a connection.

Save on samples

Save on sample costs and present all color ways. With the high resolution collection images you can show your products in detail without having them with you.

Realtime stock levels

Monitor sales and update forecasts in real time whilst you sell. Access instantly updated product info, stock levels and new or dropped style. Place orders directly into your own enterprise back office system.

News

Dobotex teams up with Colect.io to upgrade their mobile order entry

Dobotex - licensee of PUMA, HEAD, Levis, Tommy Hilfiger socks and underwear and Colect.io (formally known as Apps4Fashion) - supplier of innovative and efficient mobile order entry solutions - have teamed up to bring the mobile order entry process to a next level. more ›

Colect.io (by Apps4Fashion) warmly welcomes footwear brand Hinson

After a thorough search for the best mobile order solution Omniwear International, manufacturer of footwear brand Hinson, decided to implement the mobile order application of Colect.io more ›

Klerx Shoes successfully launches B2B web shop

Dutch footwear wholesaler, P.J. Klerx & Zonen located in Waalwijk, known from Red-Rag, Develop and Paul Green, has successfully launched their B2B web shop. more ›
